citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200 on
18-Jan-17. Attempted inspection on 01-18-17 at 1200 hours but licensee was not home.and no person was
available on premise to conduct inspection. No answer at door. Contacted owner by phone and left message. Left
business card with inspector contact information.
The licensee must be available during normal business hours, and if licensee cannot be available during normal
business hours, a responsible adult (18 years or older) shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during
the inspection process. Please contact Thomas Secor, VMO at 605-214-0847.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1200 on
18-Jan-17. Attempted inspection on 01-18-17 at 1200 hours but licensee was not home.and no person was
available on premise to conduct inspection. No answer at door.  Contacted owner by phone and left message. Left
business card with inspector contact information.
The licensee must be available during normal business hours, and if licensee cannot be available during normal
business hours, a responsible adult (18 years or older) shall be made available to accompany APHIS officials during
the inspection process. Please contact Thomas Secor, VMO at 605-214-0847.
